"Nice to meet you.<br>I am Magical Robo: "It is you, isn't it? The one who took orders from Mitarashi and the others when they were here before?"

"Giving orders to other ARKS...
It looked really fun!"
"We want to try it as well. Will you please let us issue some orders to you?"
"If you want to take orders from me, just speak to me again."
"Take your time deciding. I'll be on standby here."
"Oh, excuse me. I dozed off there."
"I was up all night working on something."
"Take a look at my legs! Aren't the heel parts erotic?"

"Their smooth curves, their mechanical form...
Soooooo erotic..."
"Jet Boots are great, aren't they? They're so cool, and so much fun."

"Next time we meet, let's pass some time by talking about mecha."
